Class Line

java.lang.Object
  Shape
      TwoPointShape
          Line
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Line
extends TwoPointShape

The line class implements methods necessary to manipulate lines, extending the TwoPointShape abstract class.

See Also:
Serialized Form

exterior

public boolean exterior(int x,
                        int y)
Determine if the exterior area of a line is selected.

Parameters:
x - X co-ordinate.
y - Y co-ordinate.
Returns:
Returns true if the x,y values are at the edge of this shape.
